u have to add an entry to the /boot/grub/menu.1st ... then run  grub-install

In one of the later steps in that setup there is a place where you set your monitor's profile and you choose the best resolution supported by that montitor. Mine was only set to 1024 by default but you can choose higher ones on the list.
